name: TalenTale
introduce: Talentale is a Web3 professional social networking platform that allows users to monetize professional experiences through NFTlization. Essentially, It help users mint professional experience into TalenTale NFTs Talentcard, which can be later sent or traded. Through its built-in crypto incentives and AI engine, user's information will be self-governed and traded, as it will increase in value over time as they establish professional identity further.
